notes: Summary: Solo tangles with a terrorist organization and runs into an old flame.
Data from Kelly Langston-Smith, Ramon Schenk, Ralf Haring, et al. via Grand Comics Database.

242.title: Spider-Man
242.author: script, Eric Fein ; pencils, Ron Randall ; inks, Sam de la Rosa ; colors, Kevin Tinsley ; letters, Steve Dutro
notes: Summary: Spider-Man and Solo try to save an ambassador from the A.R.E.S. terrorists.
Data from Kelly Langston-Smith, Ramon Schenk, Per Sandell, et al. via Grand Comics Database.

243.title: Spider-Man
243.author: script, Eric Fein ; pencils, Ron Randall ; inks, Sam de la Rosa ; colors, Kevin Tinsley ; letters, Steve Dutro
notes: Summary: Fight with A.R.E.S. ends with Spider-Man arresting Solo for his violent ways.
Data from Kelly Langston-Smith, Ramon Schenk, Ralf Haring, et al. via Grand Comics Database.

244.title: Spider-Man
244.author: [No author]
notes: Chronicles events between the first appearance of Spider-Man, in Amazing Fantasy, no. 15 (Aug. 1962) and the beginning of his own title, Amazing Spider-Man, no. 1 (Mar. 1963).

245.title: Spider-Man
245.author: by Greg Cox
245.appears_in: 15 p. text in Web of Spider-Man, no. 120 (Jan. 1995).

246.title: Spider-Man
246.author: Terry Kavanagh, writer ; Steven Butler, breakdowns ; Emberlin & Hudson, finishes
246.appears_in: 22 p. in Web of Spider-Man, no. 120 (Jan. 1995)
notes: SUMMARY: The Scarlet Spider battles Tombstone; The Grim Hunter stalks the Scarlet Spider; Kaine has a vision of a dead Mary Jane Watson-Parker; Mary Jane reconciles with her father. I. Kavanagh, Terry. II. Butler, Steven. III. Emberlin. IV. Hudson. V. Series. VI. Spider-Man. k. Scarlet Spider. k. Tombstone. k. Grim Hunter. k. Stalking. k. Kaine. k. Visions. k. Death. k. Watson-Parker, Mary Jane. k. Reconciliation. k. Fathers. Call no.: PN6728.5.M3W38no.120

247.title: Spider-Man
247.author: Tom Brevoort, Mike Kanterovich, script ; Bill Wylie, breakdowns ; Tony DeZuniga, finishes ; John Hoston, colors ; John Costanza, letters
247.appears_in: 38 p. in The Secret Defenders, no. 25 (Mar. 1995).
notes: Note: Defenders are time displaced (Spider-Man in black costume); baby girl of the Steadbaur couple is to be the 3rd Cognoscenti.
Data from Robert Wood via Grand Comics Database Project.

279.title: Spider-Man (story list)
notes:
A chronological list of comic book stories by cover date of first publication. Stories appear in various titles, including
  • Amazing Fantasy
  • The Amazing Spider-Man
  • The Amazing Spider-Man Annual
  • Giant-Size Spider-Man
  • Peter Parker, the Spectacular Spider-Man
  • Solo
  • Spectacular Spider-Man
  • Spider-Man
  • Spider-Man 2099
  • Spidey Super Stories
  • Web of Spider-Man
    and see also characters
  • Doctor Octopus
  • Green Goblin
  • The Hobgoblin
  • Kingpin
  • Man-Wolf
  • Mysterio
  • Parker, Peter
  • The Sandman
  • Stacy, Gwen
  • The Vulture
  • Watson, Mary Jane
    and see also
  • The Daily Bugle
  • Spider Sense
  • Spidey
The newspaper strip is listed at Amazing Spider-Man
